introduction.description: I’m a Junior Full Stack Developer based in Italy. I am passionate about technology and always looking for new challenges.

projects.title: Some of my projects
projects.future: New projects are in progress... stay tuned!

pittari.title: Pittari Website
pittari.description: The project combines a passion for languages with web development. Pittari (ピッタリ in Japanese) is a portal that offers various useful features for learning Japanese. From kanji search to articles and forums, Pittari provides comprehensive resources for Japanese language learners.

petcenter.title: Pet Center
petcenter.description: Welcome to Pet Center, your online hub for everything related to pets. A particular focus on CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).

gym_laravel.title: Gym Management
gym_laravel.description: A platform that allows users to book a wide range of activities and courses managed by registered providers. Users can explore various categories of activities such as sports, hobbies.

gym_wordpress.title: Dynamic Body Gym
gym_wordpress.description: This WordPress website is designed for a gym and wellness center, offering comprehensive features to cater to members and potential clients alike. It serves as a central hub for information about gym services, operating hours, fitness classes, and more.

weather.title: Raining Bot
weather.description: Raining Bot is a Node.js-based Discord bot designed to provide real-time weather updates and forecasts. This bot leverages weather APIs to deliver accurate and timely weather information directly to your Discord server.
